insight: **Network Quality Churn Insight:** This high-value customer ($8713 CLTV) churned despite subscribing to Operator B (Champion)'s premium "Infinite Plus" plan due to network issues in Rural California. Their extremely high data usage (145.88GB download) and significant OTT consumption (20.66GB) suggests streaming and connectivity problems in their area. They likely switched to Operator T's "Operator T 5G unlimited" plan, which has better rural coverage.
